The drive for Spanx for myself was inspired first even before the idea came to me.
I was doing a lot of visualization...
...for an idea or a concept that I could own for myself.
I've been selling fax machines door-to-door for seven years.
I knew I could sell, and I really, truly sort of manifested this for myself...
...through a lot of thought and time and attention to what I could do that would empower me...
...and allow me to take my own journey in my own course.
So the day I cut the feet out of my pantyhose, a lot of women had done that before me...
...apparently, but I saw it as the sign I had been looking for and I ran with it.
